selected_quotes: 75 years after his death, the creator of stereophonic sound, British inventor Alan Blumlein, gets a Grammy Award.
Alan Blumlein has won a grammy after his death #AlanBlumlein
Alan Blumlein to be given a posthumous Grammy Award for technical services to music, 75 years after his death
Without Alan Blumlein's genius, most things would sound altogether different today
Imagine a world without genius of Blumlein, inventor of stereo #Grammys
